devnotes.remarks: Returns the current processing status of a request.
devnotes.param: If I told you, it wouldn't be a secret.
Key.

devnotes.remarks: Returns a JSON object containing all of the birthdays for people that are listed in the Wikidata database with a TMDb ID. This is cached on disk. If the cache is not available, a small delay will be incurred while the data is retrieved from Wikidata in real-time.
devnotes.param: If I told you, it wouldn't be a secret.
Birth Month (1-12).
Birth Day (1-31).
Key to lookup progress with the Progress endpoint.

devnotes.remarks: Returns a JSON object containing all of the deathdays for people that are listed in the Wikidata database. This is cached on disk. If the cache is not available, a small delay will be incurred while the data is retrieved from Wikidata in real-time.
devnotes.param: If I told you, it wouldn't be a secret.
Death Month (1-12).
Death Day (1-31).
Key to lookup progress with the Progress endpoint.

devnotes.remarks: Returns a JSON object containing all of the release days for mvoies that are listed in the Wikidata database. This is cached on disk. If the cache is not available, a small delay will be incurred while the data is retrieved from Wikidata in real-time.
devnotes.param: If I told you, it wouldn't be a secret.
Release Month (1-12).
Release Day (1-31).
Key to lookup progress with the Progress endpoint.

devnotes.remarks: Returns a list of Actors with a birthday that falls on the supplied month and day. NOTE: This data is cached. If you reqest a birthday that has not currently cached, there will be a substantial delay in processsing this request. Please pass in a Progress parameter (something like a GUID) and then check on the progress of the request by passing the same parameter to the Progress endpoint.
devnotes.param: If I told you, it wouldn't be a secret.
Birth Month (1-12).
Birth Day (1-31).
Key to lookup progress with the Progress endpoint.

devnotes.remarks: Returns a list of Actors with a birthday that falls on the supplied month and day. NOTE: This data is cached. If you reqest a birthday that has not currently cached, there will be a substantial delay in processsing this request. Please pass in a Progress parameter (something like a GUID) and then check on the progress of the request by passing the same parameter to the Progress endpoint.
devnotes.param: If I told you, it wouldn't be a secret.
Birth Month (1-12).
Birth Day (1-31).
Key to lookup progress with the Progress endpoint.

devnotes.remarks: Returns a list of Actors that passed away on the specified month and day. NOTE: This data is cached. If you reqest a birthday that has not currently cached, there will be a substantial delay in processsing this request. Please pass in a Progress parameter (something like a GUID) and then check on the progress of the request by passing the same parameter to the Progress endpoint.
devnotes.param: If I told you, it wouldn't be a secret.
Death Month (1-12).
Death Day (1-31).
Key to lookup progress with the Progress endpoint.

devnotes.remarks: Returns a list of the top 50 Actors that passed away on the specified month and day. NOTE: This data is cached. If you reqest a birthday that has not currently cached, there will be a substantial delay in processsing this request. Please pass in a Progress parameter (something like a GUID) and then check on the progress of the request by passing the same parameter to the Progress endpoint.
devnotes.param: If I told you, it wouldn't be a secret.
Death Month (1-12).
Death Day (1-31).
Key to lookup progress with the Progress endpoint.

devnotes.remarks: Returns a list of the Movies released on the specified month and day. NOTE: This data is cached. If you reqest a day that has not currently cached, there will be a substantial delay in processsing this request. Please pass in a Progress parameter (something like a GUID) and then check on the progress of the request by passing the same parameter to the Progress endpoint.
devnotes.param: If I told you, it wouldn't be a secret.
Release Month (1-12).
Release Day (1-31).
Key to lookup progress with the Progress endpoint.

devnotes.remarks: Returns a list of Actors that are rated as in the Top 1000 according to TMDb, using the same format as the other actor-related endpoints.
devnotes.param: If I told you, it wouldn't be a secret.
Key to lookup progress with the Progress endpoint.

devnotes.remarks: Returns a list of Actors that are rated as in the Top 5000 according to TMDb, using the same format as the other actor-related endpoints.
devnotes.param: If I told you, it wouldn't be a secret.
Key to lookup progress with the Progress endpoint.

devnotes.remarks: Returns a list of Actors that are the top-rated for a given day
devnotes.param: If I told you, it wouldn't be a secret.
Release Month (1-12).
Release Day (1-31).

devnotes.remarks: Returns a list of Actors that match whatever search term is passed. the search results include only those poeple that have been cached already, which is limited to anyone in the Top5000 list or that has a defined birthday in Wikidata, or that has been cached due to an extended search.
devnotes.param: If I told you, it wouldn't be a secret.
Term to search for in People. Must be at least three characters.
Key to lookup progress with the Progress endpoint.

devnotes.remarks: Returns a list of Actors that match whatever search term is passed.
devnotes.param: If I told you, it wouldn't be a secret.
Term to search for in People. Must be at least three characters.
Key to lookup progress with the Progress endpoint.

devnotes.remarks: Returns a list of Actors that are related to the indicated person.
devnotes.param: If I told you, it wouldn't be a secret.
Searches for people related to this person, a WikiData ID.
Key to lookup progress with the Progress endpoint.

devnotes.remarks: Returns a JSON object showing the current version number and also the image to load initially for the main display (the first person on the current date).
devnotes.param: The current day (local to the user) that we're looking up (MMDD)

devnotes.remarks: Returns whatever lookup request is received. Might be a one or more actors, movies or tv shows, specified in the request.
devnotes.param: If I told you, it wouldn't be a secret.
JSON Lookup request.
Key to lookup progress with the Progress endpoint.
